name: Bar Fighter
description:
Life's hard for a bro, but do not despair my supreme dude. There is an app for that. "Bar Fighter" helps you find likeminded bros to get that extra energy out with a good old street fight. There is a convenient chat system so you can find out if you really dislike each other. No point in fighting a potential buddy!

This is my entry for LD41, it's a mashup of a dating sim and a fighting game. The total time was 25 hours. 

I spent too much time on drawing the outfits and making the chat system look nice. I could have used that time to tune up the fighting mechanics, but regardless I'm pretty pleased with the results.

Tools used: Unity, Bosca Ceoil, Pixelmator, Visual Studio 

Game Jam Entry: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/$86320
